alert.note: Alert for Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell; South Central Utah; Western Canyonlands (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 03 at 3:39AM MDT until April 03 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...South Central Utah, Western Canyonlands and Glen Canyon Recreation Area/Lake Powell. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 9 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult due to crosswinds, especially for high profile vehicles and vehicles with trailers. Rough conditions are possible on Lake Powell.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell; South Central Utah; Western Canyonlands
